Name: Emergency Cooling
Desc: During the first half of the race, each time you collect a Red Orb, there is a chance to gain a small speed boost.

Name: Hyperspace Lag
UltraShout: Your speed is under my control!
Desc: Significantly slows down all other characters.

Name: Lulu Chef
Desc: When gaining a Signal Orb, there is a chance to invite one random character ahead to a "meal" to slow them down.

Name: Froggie's Protection
UltraShout: Froggie, lead me through the mist and the abyss!
Desc: Gains Froggie's protection, granting acceleration and immunity to debuffs.

Name: Emergency Rescue
Desc: When affected by debuffs, there's a chance to gain 1 random Signal Orb

Name: Training Plan
Desc: Analyzes the track conditions and adapts driving style to gain long-lasting acceleration.

Name: Light-Dark Cycle
Desc: Starts in Dark Form and switches to Light Form in the second half of the race.

Name: Final Prayer
UltraShout: Hearken now... to the dirge of the engine!
Desc: While in Dark Form, slows all other characters when triggered; while in Light Form, gains a speed boost instead.

Name: Nanami Percent
Desc: 70% chance to gain 1 additional Signal Orb when gaining a Signal Orb.

Name: Let's Go!
Desc: Gain a major speed boost, with a 70% chance to extend its duration by 2 seconds.

Name: Battle! Awesome!
Desc: When affected by a debuff, there's a chance to be immune to it.

Name: Master Heartflow
UltraShout: I'll cut my own path with speed!
Desc: Enter Master Mode until the end of the race, gaining increased speed and improved nitro gain from drifting.

Name: Infrastructure Engineering
Desc: Modify your current track to gain extra acceleration during the first half of the race.

Name: Center Stage
Desc: Gain a major speed boost. Other characters gain a minor speed boost.

Name: The Forsaken
Desc: Immune to all effects

Name: Fearless
Desc: Lose the Forsaken effect and gain permanent speed and acceleration boosts. Can only occur once per game.

Name: Thunder Charge
Desc: Immediately gain 3 random Signal Orbs at the start of the race.

Name: Roar
UltraShout: I will break all limits of speed!
Desc: Gain a major speed boost.

Name: Big Spender
Desc: When gaining Signal Orbs in the first half of the race, there is a chance to gain 1 additional random Signal Orb.

Name: Color Mixing
Desc: Gain a minor speed boost.

Name: Better Safe Than Sorry
Desc: Immune to debuffs in the first half of the race.

Name: Change of Plans!
Desc: Removes all debuffs from all characters while granting yourself a large speed boost.

Name: It's Mine!
Desc: During the first half of the race, upon entering a curve, steals one random Signal Orb from a random character.

Name: Evernight Flame
UltraShout: The flames shall reveal the empty finish line I leave behind!
Desc: Casts Evernight Flame, reducing the speed and acceleration of all other characters.

Name: Multiplication will descend here
Desc: In the second half of the race, the number of Signal Orbs gained each time is doubled.

Name: Ascension Calculation
UltraShout: This is the power of the Ascension-Network!
Desc: Slows all characters ranked above you.

Name: My Turn
Desc: Each time you enter a curve, there's a chance to gain one random Signal Orb and activate its effect.

Name: I'm here to help!
UltraShout: Can you keep up with my speed?
Desc: Grants a speed boost and debuff immunity to yourself and one random racer ranked below you.

Name: Enthronement
Desc: Triggers when your rank drops in the second half of the race, granting an instant large speed boost. Can trigger once per race.

Name: Will of Kowloong
UltraShout: Face the combined will... of Kowloong!
Desc: All characters gain a small speed boost, while you gain an additional large speed boost.

Name: Nap
Desc: In the latter half of the race, may randomly fall asleep, gaining a random Signal Orb but slowing down briefly.

Name: Morning Grumpiness
Desc: Locks onto 6 random targets ahead and launches an attack.

Name: Recitativo
Desc: During the first half of the race, gains and activates one random Signal Orb upon entering a straight section.

Name: Concerto
UltraShout: Come, let us perform this piece together.
Desc: Gains a speed boost and has a chance to slow down 3 random characters ahead.

Name: Alpha Wolf
Desc: Gains a brief large boost at the start of the race.

Name: Pursuer
Desc: Marks 3 random targets and steals their speed for a duration.

Name: Echoes
Desc: Each time you gain a speed boost, there is a chance to extend the duration of all your current speed boosts.

Name: Encore
UltraShout: The melody refuses to fade. Shall we continue?
Desc: Gain a medium speed boost and has a chance to recover 1-2 Signal Orbs.

Name: Positive Bolster
Desc: When affected by a debuff, gains a speed boost.

Name: Cecily!
Desc: Someone hidden nearby lends a push from the side, giving you a major speed boost.

Name: Chill
Desc: Slightly decelerates during the first half of the race. In the second half, has a chance to gain a medium speed boost at any time.

Name: Siren Song
UltraShout: Sink to the bottom of this sea.
Desc: Inflicts deceleration on a random number of other characters.

Name: Wish-Mael
Desc: When entering the second half of the race, grants yourself and the character in last place a brief large speed boost.

Name: Chaotic Dimension
UltraShout: Would you like to see something beyond the dimensions?
Desc: Summons a strike from higher-dimensional energy, attacking a random number of other characters.

Name: Winner Takes All
Desc: After using a Signature Move, becomes immune to debuffs for a short time.

Name: Loaded Die
Desc: All characters, including Lilith, gain one random Signal Orb and immediately trigger its effect (will not trigger skill effects).

Name: Potential Charge
Desc: Starts at a lower speed but gradually increases maximum speed throughout the race.

Name: True Dragon Stance
Desc: Enters Dragoon Mode. Can only trigger once per race. Afterward, gains a short-duration shield every set distance traveled.

Name: Opening Mark
Desc: Starts with Mark Buff

Name: Half Court Mark
Desc: Remove Mark Buff after the midpoint

Name: Shark-speare Skill
Desc: During the first half of the race, there is a chance to gain a small speed boost upon collecting a Red Orb.

Name: Shark-speare Signature
Desc: Significantly slows down all other characters.

Name: Pointy Skill
Desc: When affected by a debuff, there's a chance to be immune to it.

Name: Pointy Signature
Desc: Gain increased speed and improved nitro gain from drifting until the end of the race.

Name: Pokey Skill
Desc: When gaining Signal Orbs in the first half of the race, there is a chance to gain 1 additional random Signal Orb.

Name: Pokey Signature
Desc: Gain a small speed boost.

Name: Rose Skill
Desc: Immune to all effects.

Name: Rose Signature
Desc: Lose the skill effects and gain permanent speed and acceleration boosts. Can only occur once per game.

Name: Spray Skill
Desc: Triggers when dropping in ranks in the second half of the race, granting an instant large speed boost. Can trigger once per race.

Name: Spray Signature
Desc: All characters gain a small speed boost, while you gain an additional large speed boost.

Name: Repair Skill
Desc: After using a Signature Move, becomes immune to debuffs for a short duration.

Name: Repair Signature
Desc: All characters, including Lilith, gain one random Signal Orb and immediately trigger its effect (will not trigger skill effects).
